member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.WebTesting.DataBindingAccessMethod
member.summary: Enumeration for the access method that is used for data binding.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.WebTesting.DataBindingAccessMethod.Random
member.summary: Randomly selects data from the data source for the duration of the test.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.WebTesting.DataBindingAccessMethod.Sequential
member.summary: Sequentially selects data from the data source for the duration of the test. If necessary, starts at the first row of the data source again.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.WebTesting.DataBindingAccessMethod.Unique
member.summary: Sequentially selects each element in the data source only one time and ends the test when the data is exhausted. For example, if the data source has ten rows, then the load test will have ten test iterations executed and then stop, even if there is time left in the test duration. Additionally, if there are other tests in the load test not using the unique data binding option, the load test will continue to run those tests although the unique tests have ended.
